document_data.name: Delayed Blast
document_data.mainbody: '''''Delayed blast''''' was a mixed alcoholic beverage that could be found in the Realms during the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite web/theedverse/2020-06-18 - Delayed blast}}
document_data.Description: The drink was made by a combining ''[[Sarrak (beverage)|sarrak]]'', a juice made from [[cherries]] called ''[[red renth]]'', and the garden vegetable ''[[sweetstalk]]''.
document_data.Effects: An individual may feel nothing for a matter of minutes after drinking ''delayed blast''. When the "blast" took place, they would feel burning sensation in the back of their throat, the back of their nose, and around the forehead. This was followed by a dulled sense of hearing and a lessened sensation of pain.
